mapper:
USER_ID ,USERNAME ,PASSWORD ,BIRTH_DATE ,SEX ,AGE
inner join role_permission rp on r.role_id = rp.role_id left join blog b on b.user_id = r.user_id where r.role_id = ? and r.role_name = ? and b.content like ? and r.modified between #modifiedBegin# and #modifiedEnd# group by r.role_id
and username > #username# and password = #password#
and username = #secondUsername#
and username > #username# and password = #password# and username = #secondUsername# and username = #noduplicationUsername#
INSERT INTO user_info (user_id,username,password) values (#user_id#,#username#,#password#)
select last_insert_id() from any
INSERT INTO user_info (age,username,password,birth_date,sex,user_id) values ('23',#username#,#password#,curdate(),'12','123111')
select last_insert_id() from any
UPDATE user_info SET username = #username#,password = #password# WHERE username = #username#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.queryByUserId*/ USER_ID,USERNAME,PASSWORD,BIRTH_DATE,SEX,AGE from user_info where user_id = #userId#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.countUsername*/ count(username) username_cnt,sum(age) sum_age from user_info where user_id = #userId# and age = #age.cent# and sex = #sex.cent# and username > #maxUsername# and username < #minUsername#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.countDynimicUsername*/ count(username) username_cnt,sum(age) sum_age from user_info where user_id = #userId# and age = #age.cent# and sex = #sex.cent# and username > #maxUsername# and username < #minUsername#
INSERT INTO USER_INFO ( USER_ID , USERNAME , PASSWORD , BIRTH_DATE , SEX , AGE ) VALUES ( #userId# , #username# , #password# , #birthDate# , #sex.cent# , #age.cent# )
select last_insert_id()
UPDATE USER_INFO SET USERNAME = #username# , PASSWORD = #password# , BIRTH_DATE = #birthDate# , SEX = #sex.cent# , AGE = #age.cent# WHERE USER_ID = #userId#
DELETE FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #userId#
SELECT /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.getById*/ USER_ID ,USERNAME ,PASSWORD ,BIRTH_DATE ,SEX ,AGE
FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #userId#
SELECT /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.findPage.count*/ count(*) FROM USER_INFO <dynamic prepend="WHERE"> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="userId"> USER_ID = #userId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="username"> USERNAME = #username# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="password"> PASSWORD = #password# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="birthDateBegin"> BIRTH_DATE >= #birthDateBegin# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="birthDateEnd"> BIRTH_DATE <= #birthDateEnd# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="sex"> SEX = #sex.cent# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="age"> AGE = #age.cent# </isNotEmpty> </dynamic>
SELECT /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.findPage*/ USER_ID ,USERNAME ,PASSWORD ,BIRTH_DATE ,SEX ,AGE FROM USER_INFO <dynamic prepend="WHERE"> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="userId"> USER_ID = #userId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="username"> USERNAME = #username# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="password"> PASSWORD = #password# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="birthDateBegin"> BIRTH_DATE >= #birthDateBegin# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="birthDateEnd"> BIRTH_DATE <= #birthDateEnd# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="sex"> SEX = #sex.cent# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="age"> AGE = #age.cent# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="includeAges"> age in <iterate open="(" close=")" conjunction="," property="includeAges"> #includeAges[]# </iterate> </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="orIncludeAges"> <iterate open="(" close=")" conjunction="OR" property="orIncludeAges"> age = #orIncludeAges[]# </iterate> </isNotEmpty> </dynamic> <isNotEmpty prepend="ORDER BY" property="orderBy"> #orderBy# </isNotEmpty>
limit #offset#,#limit#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.findPage.count*/ count(*) FROM USER_INFO <dynamic prepend="WHERE"> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="userId"> USER_ID = #userId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="username"> USERNAME = #username# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="password"> PASSWORD = #password# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="birthDateBegin"> BIRTH_DATE >= #birthDateBegin# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="birthDateEnd"> BIRTH_DATE <= #birthDateEnd# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="sex"> SEX = #sex.cent# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="age"> AGE = #age.cent# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="includeAges"> age in <iterate open="(" close=")" conjunction="," property="includeAges"> #includeAges[]# </iterate> </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty prepend="AND" property="orIncludeAges"> <iterate open="(" close=")" conjunction="OR" property="orIncludeAges"> age = #orIncludeAges[]# </iterate> </isNotEmpty> </dynamic>
SELECT /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.getByUsername*/ USER_ID ,USERNAME ,PASSWORD ,BIRTH_DATE ,SEX ,AGE FROM USER_INFO WHERE USERNAME = #username#
SELECT /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.getByAge*/ USER_ID ,USERNAME ,PASSWORD ,BIRTH_DATE ,SEX ,AGE FROM USER_INFO WHERE AGE = #age.cent#
SELECT /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.subSelectNotOrderBy*/ USER_ID ,USERNAME ,PASSWORD ,BIRTH_DATE ,SEX ,AGE FROM USER_INFO WHERE AGE in (select age from User_info where username = #username#) AND sex in (select age from User_info where sex = #sex.cent# and password = #password# and BIRTH_DATE = #birthDate#)
SELECT /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.fromSubQuery*/ USER_ID ,USERNAME ,PASSWORD ,BIRTH_DATE ,SEX ,AGE FROM (select * from user_info)
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testSqlMap*/ * from user_info where user_id = 123 /* sqlmap value */
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testSqlMap.count*/ count(*) from user_info where user_id = 123 /* sqlmap value */
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testSqlMapWithParamsReplace*/ * from user_info where user_id = #userId# and password = #password# or sex = 'sexinsex'
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testSqlMapWithParamsReplace.count*/ count(*) from user_info where user_id = #userId# and password = #password# or sex = 'sexinsex'
SELECT /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testNotParameter*/ <include refid="columns"/> FROM USER_INFO
SELECT /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testIncludeByRefid*/ <include refid="columns"/> FROM USER_INFO WHERE AGE = #age.cent#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testSelectColumnsWithQuery*/ USER_ID,USERNAME,(select password from user_info where password = #pwd_in_select_query# ) pwd_from_select_query from user_info where user_id = #userId#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testRoleJoinRolePermissionJoinBlog*/ ROLE_ID,ROLE_NAME,RESOURCE_ID,USER_ID,ROLE_DESC,CREATED,MODIFIED,ROLE_ID,PERMISSOIN_ID,BLOG_ID,USER_ID,USERNAME,CREATED,MODIFIED,TITLE,CONTENT,CONTENT_LENGTH,STATUS from role r inner join role_permission rp on r.role_id = rp.role_id left join blog b on b.user_id = r.user_id where r.role_id = #roleId# and r.role_name = #roleName#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testRoleJoinRolePermissionJoinBlogWithCustomParam*/ r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r inner join role_permission rp on r.role_id = rp.role_id left join blog b on b.user_id = r.user_id where r.role_id = #roleId# and r.role_name = #roleName# and b.content like #content# and r.modified between #modifiedBegin# and #modifiedEnd# group by r.role_id
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testGroupByPaging*/ r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r inner join role_permission rp on r.role_id = rp.role_id left join blog b on b.user_id = r.user_id where r.role_id = #roleId# and r.role_name = #roleName# and b.content like #content# and r.modified between #modifiedBegin# and #modifiedEnd# group by r.role_id limit #offset#,#limit#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testGroupByPaging.count*/ count(*) from ( select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r inner join role_permission rp on r.role_id = rp.role_id left join blog b on b.user_id = r.user_id where r.role_id = #roleId# and r.role_name = #roleName# and b.content like #content# and r.modified between #modifiedBegin# and #modifiedEnd# group by r.role_id ) forGroupByCountTable
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testSetOperations*/ r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
UNION select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
UNION ALL select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
MINUS select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
EXCEPT select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
INTERSECT select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
/* h2不支持集合操作 *//* EXCEPT ALL select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
INTERSECT ALL select role_id,sum(user_id) sum_user_id from role r
*/ limit #offset#,#limit#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testSetOperations.count*/ count(*) from role r
UNION select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
UNION ALL select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
MINUS select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
EXCEPT select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
INTERSECT select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
/* h2不支持集合操作 *//* EXCEPT ALL select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
INTERSECT ALL select role_id,sum(user_id) sum_user_id from role r
*/
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testMybatisOrderByPagingWithIf*/ r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r inner join role_permission rp on r.role_id = rp.role_id left join blog b on b.user_id = r.user_id where r.role_id = #roleId# and r.role_name = #roleName# and b.content like #content# and r.modified between #modifiedBegin# and #modifiedEnd# group by r.role_id
order by r.role_id
order by sum_user_id
order by r.role_id
order by r.role_id
order by r.role_id
limit #offset#,#limit#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testMybatisOrderByPagingWithIf.count*/ count(*) from ( select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r inner join role_permission rp on r.role_id = rp.role_id left join blog b on b.user_id = r.user_id where r.role_id = #roleId# and r.role_name = #roleName# and b.content like #content# and r.modified between #modifiedBegin# and #modifiedEnd# group by r.role_id
) forGroupByCountTable
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testOpenClose*/ r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r inner join role_permission rp on r.role_id = rp.role_id left join blog b on b.user_id = r.user_id where r.role_id = #roleId# and r.role_name = #roleName# and b.content like #content# and r.modified between #modifiedBegin# and #modifiedEnd# and r.role_name in #roleNames[]# group by r.role_id limit #offset#,#limit#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testOpenClose.count*/ count(*) from ( select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r inner join role_permission rp on r.role_id = rp.role_id left join blog b on b.user_id = r.user_id where r.role_id = #roleId# and r.role_name = #roleName# and b.content like #content# and r.modified between #modifiedBegin# and #modifiedEnd# and r.role_name in #roleNames[]# group by r.role_id ) forGroupByCountTable
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testXmlEscape*/ ROLE_ID,ROLE_NAME,RESOURCE_ID,USER_ID,ROLE_DESC,CREATED,MODIFIED from role r where r.role_id < ? and r.role_name > #roleName# limit #offset#,#limit#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testXmlEscape.count*/ count(*) from role r where r.role_id < ? and r.role_name > #roleName#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testIncludeWhere*/ USER_ID,USERNAME,PASSWORD,BIRTH_DATE,SEX,AGE from user_info r where 1=1
limit #offset#,#limit#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testIncludeWhere.count*/ count(*) from user_info r where 1=1
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testIncludeWhereWithNoPaging*/ USER_ID,USERNAME,PASSWORD,BIRTH_DATE,SEX,AGE from user_info r where 1=1
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.countByUserId*/ count(*) from user_info where user_id = #userId#

r.role_id = #roleId# and r.role_name = #roleName# and b.content like #content# and r.modified between #modifiedBegin# and #modifiedEnd# and r.role_name in #{item}
and b.content = #{contentIf1}
and b.content = #{contentIf2}
and b.content = #{contentIf3}
and b.content = #{contentIf4}
and b.content = #{contentIf5}
group by r.role_id limit #offset#,#limit#
select /*badqiu_test_app.UserInfo.testMybatisForEach.count*/ count(*) from ( select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r inner join role_permission rp on r.role_id = rp.role_id left join blog b on b.user_id = r.user_id
r.role_id = #roleId# and r.role_name = #roleName# and b.content like #content# and r.modified between #modifiedBegin# and #modifiedEnd# and r.role_name in #{item}
and b.content = #{contentIf1}
and b.content = #{contentIf2}
and b.content = #{contentIf3}
and b.content = #{contentIf4}
and b.content = #{contentIf5}
group by r.role_id ) forGroupByCountTable
